1.title: The Summer of Us
1.plot: Paige and Frankie and all the other Vuuuglers are excited by Liam's newest idea--Vuuugle House a place where they can all live and film their videos.

2.title: Two Me's in a Pod
2.plot: Amelia's little sister comes to visit the Vuuugle House; when the ping pong table is broken, the house is divided into Team Air Hockey vs. Team Pinball.

3.title: House Moms
3.plot: Paige and Frankie attempt to bring order to the chaos that is the Vuuugle House household.

4.title: No Way Whoa
4.plot: Paige and Frankie vie with Zane and Rodney to represent Vuuugle House on Rory Finch's No Way Whoa. program, meanwhile no one notices Amelia and Bernie are trapped in the basement.

5.title: Tree's Company
5.plot: To reassure Willow that they are as close as sisters as they ever were, Amelia joins her protest of tree-sitting in an endangered tree.

6.title: Summer Schooled
6.plot: When an accident befalls Frankie's assigned Summer School teacher, Principal Karen steps in.

7.title: Halloweenvark Part Three: Mali-Boo!
7.plot: When the gang forgets to buy candy for the trick-or-treaters, they each take turns telling scary Halloween stories to make the kids forget about candy.

8.title: Holiday Video Spectacular
8.plot: It's the Holiday Season, and the Vuuuglers have all made videos to celebrate it.

9.title: Eye of the Duckworth
9.plot: Paige and Willow sell homemade granola at the local farmers market; Bernie and Frankie try to return a cellphone to its angry owner.

10.title: Who is Horse Face Guy?
10.plot: When Horse Face Guy's latest dance video goes viral, Paige and Frankie urge him to reveal his identity to the world.

11.title: Paige's Way vs. Frankie's Way
11.plot: When Bernie and Zane ask Paige and Frankie to give them feedback on their magic tricks, the girls decide to put their opposing views to the test.

12.title: Bernie's Cousin Ernie
12.plot: Bernie is dreading the visit of his cousin, Ernie Plotz, who apparently, is good at everything.

13.title: PK in Da House
13.plot: When Principal Karen becomes a chaperon in the house, Liam ends up falling for her, and the girls have to come clean about trying to get her out of Bizaardvark.

14.title: Bizaardvark Changes Lives
14.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

15.title: Where There's a Willow There's a Way
15.plot: Paige and Frankie realize they can use Willow's cuteness to get their chores done around the house.

16.title: A Capella Problems
16.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

17.title: The Stand-Up Standoff
17.plot: After Paige pushes Frankie to pursue her ambition of performing stand-up, the pair find themselves on opposite sides of a live "Comedy Diss Battle."

18.title: BizRipOffs
18.plot: While Paige and Frankie deal with preteen "BizRipOffs" Tiffany and Mallory, Amelia enlists Bernie to help her arrange Willow meeting her favorite superhero, Lady Lightning.

19.title: House Band
19.plot: Paige suggests Bernie, Zane and Rodney form a band in order to relieve tensions in the house.

20.title: Rozes are Red
20.plot: Awkward elder romance is in the air when Bernie's Grandma Roz meets Amelia and Willow's dad, Red. Meanwhile Frankie's driving skills are less than impressive.

21.title: The End of the Beginning
21.plot: Feeling nostalgic, Paige and Frankie agree to Roman Winwood's pitch to travel to NYC and shoot a TV series about their lives.

1.title: First!
1.plot: Paige and Frankie are over the moon when their "Bizaardvark" channel finally hits 10,000 subscribers and they are invited to produce videos in the prestigious "Vuuugle space."

2.title: Draw My Life
2.plot: Paige and Frankie create a draw my life video, however things don't go the way they want.

3.title: Frankie Has a Hater
3.plot: When the girls receive mean comments about their videos, Frankie begins to lose her confidence and becomes obsessed with finding who wrote them.

4.title: Superfan
4.plot: Paige and Frankie feel like they've officially "made it" when they discover that they have their very first super fan, Belissa.

5.title: The Collab
5.plot: Frankie and Paige try to boost their subscriber level by collaborating with popular Vuuugle stars Victor of "Prank Town" and JiffPom.

6.title: Unboxing
6.plot: When Dirk leads the gang in a circle of truth exercise, Frankie learns Paige has been secretly taking MMA lessons and decides to join in on the fun.

7.title: The First Law of Dirk
7.plot: When Paige convinces Dirk to stop doing such risky dares, his brother Kirk is worried the dare-devil is broken for good. Meanwhile, Bernie tries to find an office space to call his own for an important meeting.

8.title: Best Friend Tag
8.plot: Paige and Frankie invite Amelia over for a sleep over but someone goes a bit overboard; Bernie and Dirk try to cover up damage from a dare.

9.title: Bernie's in Charge
9.plot: When Bernie temporarily takes charge of Vuuugle, Paige and Frankie think they can do whatever they want.

10.title: Pretty-Con
10.plot: The annual beauty convention Pretty-Con comes to Vuuugle and Amelia obsesses with beating out a beauty guru for the Golden Powder Puff Award; Paige and Frankie agree to help so they can meet the host and debut their music video.

11.title: Puff and Frankie
11.plot: After Paige and Frankie encourage Bernie to sign animal clients, he decides to represent two alley cats.

12.title: Halloweenvark
12.plot: The v-loggers create scary Halloween videos for Vuuugle's homepage, but they argue over which is the scariest. Will it be Frankie and Paige's ghost of Hollander Prep, Dirk's world without dares or Amelia's zombie apocalypse?

13.title: Spoiler Alert: Belissa Returns
13.plot: When Paige and Frankie hit a writing slump and other bad things start happening to them, Paige begins to think they are cursed. Meanwhile, Amelia and Dirk are at odds when the lifestyle Diva cleans out the Dare Lair.

14.title: Bizaardvark vs Vicki 'Hot Head' Fuego
14.plot: When Paige and Frankie learn Vuuuglers get into feuds for publicity or subscribers, they decide to start a feud with 13-year-old MMA fighter Vicki "Thunder Foot" Fuego.

15.title: Moosetashio: A Cautionary Tale
15.plot: The two girls make a video with a goofy character that becomes a little too popular with the preschool set.

16.title: Control + Alt + Escape!
16.plot: A rich Bizaardvark fan kidnaps Paige and Frankie under the guise of helping them pay for the making of one of their videos.

17.title: Agh, Humbug
17.plot: Bernie gets bummed about not being invited to the Vuuugler-only holiday party, so the gang tries to turn him into an overnight online star so that he can attend, too.

18.title: Mom! Stop!
18.plot: Paige has mixed feelings when her mom hires her and Frankie to sing while they wait tables at their family restaurant. Meanwhile, Dirk gets himself trapped in his lair in an avalanche of props.

19.title: Paige's Birthday Is Gonna Be Great!
19.plot: Frankie goes to extreme lengths to throw Paige the best birthday party ever, including tricking social media star Lilly Singh to attend the party.

20.title: In Your Space!
20.plot: Paige and Frankie, along with fellow Vuuglers Victor and Dirk, are picked to participate in a popular web series reality competition called "In Your Space!" Meanwhile, Bernie tries to impress Amelia with his suave moves.

1.title: First Day of School
1.plot: Paige and Frankie take on public high school but quickly discover life at Sierra High is not what they thought it would be; Dirk, a recent Sierra grad and legend, tries to help Bernie and Amelia acclimate to their new school.

2.title: Chocolate Bananas
2.plot: An embarrassing Bizaardvark video insights a Paige and Frankie moral dilemma when the video unknowingly catches vandalism at the school.

3.title: The Doctor Will See You Now
3.plot: Frankie finally gets to spend some quality time with her dad, but she has a hard time balancing family time, school and making Bizaardvark videos with Paige.

4.title: Paige Bugs Out
4.plot: Paige regrets promising her new friend, Reese, that he will never be the subject of any Bizaardvark video, when she discovers his best friend is Roger, an actual caterpillar. Meanwhile Amelia and Bernie seek out the perfect party.

5.title: Friend Fight!
5.plot: In the midst of everyone having tiffs with one another, Amelia is asked to perform a dance in front of the entire school, and chooses Bernie to be her unlikely partner.

6.title: Hawkward
6.plot: Against the advice of Frankie, Paige decides to snatch the school mascot named "Hawk the Owl," in order to set it free.

7.title: Frankie and Amelia's Fun Friend Weekend
7.plot: When Paige and Dirk decide to go camping with Bernie and his Grandmother, Frankie and Amelia are left behind, struggling to find common ground, to formulate their own weekend plans.

8.title: Frankie's Cheating Teacher
8.plot: An attempt to get Frankie's dad back into the dating scene goes horribly wrong when he snags a date with Frankie's English teacher.

9.title: Softball: The Musical
9.plot: The group is forced to put on an entire musical about softball in order to save face with Dirk.

10.title: Yes or No
10.plot: The Bizaardvark girls bet on which will last longer, Frankie always answering "Yes," or Paige always answering "No."

11.title: Science (Un)Fair
11.plot: Paige and Frankie plan to enter a model satellite in the Sierra High Science Fair--their one problem is finding someone to build it for them.

12.title: Promposal Problems
12.plot: Paige and Frankie become the promposal masters of Sierra High until a lofty promposal ask from Bernie jeopardizes their perfect record and their friendship.

13.title: Halloweenvark: Part Boo!
13.plot: When the power goes out at Vuuugle while trying to watch a scary movie, the gang is left with no choice but to make up their own scary Halloween stories.

14.title: A Killer Robot Christmas
14.plot: Paige invites some deserving kids to Vuugle to celebrate the Christmas holidays, but it will take the whole team to get holiday-averse Liam to join in.

15.title: Clash of the Superfans
15.plot: After visiting Belissa at her new military academy, Paige and Frankie learn that she has escaped, apparently intent on confronting the other claimant to the title of Bizaardvark's greatest super fan--Principal Karen.

16.title: Don't Think, Just Dare
16.plot: Paige enlists the help of Dirk to find the courage to break up with Reese.

17.title: Bernie Moves Out
17.plot: After Bernie has had enough of his Grandma's rules, Frankie convinces him to move out of the house but she gets a surprise when she finds out Bernie is moving into her house.

18.title: The BFF (Before Frankie Friend)
18.plot: When Paige's childhood best friend Izzy comes to town, Paige becomes envious of how well Frankie and Izzy hit it off and starts to feel like the third wheel.

19.title: Amelia's Perfectly Imperfect Volleyball Adventure
19.plot: After Paige convinces the volleyball coach to put Amelia on the team, the DIY Diva's ego lands the volleyball team in a match against the state champions.

20.title: Paige Is Wrong
20.plot: When Frankie declares a girl at their school, Jade, is a bad person, Paige sets out to prove her wrong.

21.title: Spring Break Video Spectacular
21.plot: Paige and Frankie kick off spring break creating a variety of fun videos with their buddies and other fan-favorite video bloggers.

22.title: Her, Me, and Hermie
22.plot: Paige's concern for new pet Hermie, distracts her from the celebration surrounding Bizaardvark's 100th video, and seeks assistance from Yvette of Vuuugle's Veterinary Channel.

imdb.plot outline: The series revolves around two 12-year-old best friends, Paige and Frankie, who write funny songs and create music videos for their online channel, titled Bizaardvark, which has 10,000 subscribers. The amateur musicians get to work from a creative studio space that they hope will take their videos to the next level. In their cool new environment, and with the help of family and friends, the girls will embark on a series of comedic adventures in their quest to become online stars.
imdb.title: Bizaardvark
plot: Centers around two 12-year-old up-and-coming musicians Paige and Frankie who write and perform comedic songs about their everyday lives.

The series revolves around two 12-year-old best friends, Paige and Frankie, who write funny songs and create music videos for their online channel, titled _Bizaardvark_ (qv), which has 10,000 subscribers. The amateur musicians get to work from a creative studio space that they hope will take their videos to the next level. In their cool new environment, and with the help of family and friends, the girls will embark on a series of comedic adventures in their quest to become online stars.
